div.p: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.

First of all, I would like to thank you for your invitation, that touch me a lot. I could help you with de preparetion if you want. You know, I have a lot of balloons at home and I don't need them, so I can give it to you, for your party. I think that, after party I'll be able too help you to cleen and renge all it need to be cleened !
